rules: Rule1: Whenever John publishes a paper called neural_net_paper, it follows that the neural_net_paper uses the technology deep learning.

Rule2: If the Unix Lab is funded by the tech grant, then whenever the neural_net_paper uses the technology deep learning, it follows that if John works for the Unix Lab, John has the job of researcher.
Rule3: Either the Unix Lab is funded by the tech grant, or the Unix Lab is funded by a private donation.
Rule4: Provided that the Unix Lab is funded by a private donation, if the neural_net_paper uses the technology deep learning, then if John works for the Unix Lab, John has the job of researcher.
Rule5: If John retains his position, then it is not the case that John’s job is terminated.
Rule6: If it is not the case that if John does not receive the tech grant, then John has the job of researcher, then John’s job is terminated.
Rule7: If it is not the case that if John does not receive the tech grant, then John has the job of researcher, then John retains his position.
Rule8: If John does not receive the tech grant, then John works for the Unix Lab.
facts: Fact1: John publishes a paper called neural_net_paper.
Fact2: John does not have the job of researcher.
